episodes.title: Episode XL - Jack vs. the Ninja
episodes.plot: A deadly Ninja warrior has honed his skills to fight Samurai Jack. But just as he is about to ambush him, Jack is called away to rescue a village from attacking crab monsters.

episodes.title: Episode XLI - Robo-Samurai vs. Mondo-bot
episodes.plot: Robots that dwell in the sewers of Andromeda ask Jack to enter a giant Robot Samurai and battle Mondo Bot who terrorizes the city.

episodes.title: Episode XLII - Samurai vs. Samurai
episodes.plot: Samurai Jack is challenged to a duel by Da Samurai, who despite all his big mouth is not worthy to face Jack's blade.

episodes.title: Episode XLIII - The Aku Infection
episodes.plot: During battle, Samurai Jack accidentally swallows a piece of darkness coughed up by a sickly Aku. When Aku's blackness begins to take over the Samurai, he seeks help from Master Ning.

episodes.title: Episode XLIV - The Princess and the Bounty Hunters
episodes.plot: Bounty Hunters Jo Junga the Aborigional, I & Am the infamous twins, The Gentleman & Boris the Russian have all tracked down Samurai Jack up North. Princess Mira of the Andaluvians convinces them to join forces and attack the Samurai together.

episodes.title: Episode XLV - The Scotsman Saves Jack: Part I
episodes.plot: The Scotsman recognizes Samurai Jack working as a water boy on a boat and calling himself Brent Worthington. He then decides to find out why and where Jack got his memory erased by retracing his steps.

episodes.title: Episode XLVI - The Scotsman Saves Jack: Part II
episodes.plot: The Scotsman has saved Jack from living out the rest of his life as a water boy. Now they have to settle which one is more worthy to man the oars on the way back.

episodes.title: Episode XLVII - Jack and the Flying Prince and Princess
episodes.plot: Princess Verbina and Prince Astor of the Lebidoptirans are on a quest to find their star navy to save their home world Chrystalis. But they are forced to crash land on Aku's Earth and are immediately captured by his minions. Luckily Samurai Jack is witness to the events and follows them.

episodes.title: Episode XLVIII - Jack vs. Aku
episodes.plot: After all else fails, Aku challenges Samurai Jack to a duel. To make sure of a fair fight, Jack is not allowed to use his sword while Aku must fight in human form, without minions and magic tricks.

episodes.title: Episode XLIX - The Four Seasons of Death
episodes.plot: As Jack goes through fall, winter, spring and summer, he must battle the perils that each season brings.

episodes.title: Episode L - Tale of X-49
episodes.plot: An experimental X-series robot was given emotions as an experiment and therefore was the only one of it's kind to survive intact. It retired after taking a shine to sweet thing Lulu, but Aku forces it to take on one more job: hunt down Samurai Jack.

episodes.title: Episode LI - Young Jack in Africa
episodes.plot: A tale told in flashback concerning the childhood training of Samurai Jack in Africa, but, even as part the Nubian tribe, the young prince is not safe from Aku's minions.

episodes.title: Episode LII - Jack and the Baby
episodes.plot: Samurai Jack saves a baby boy from three hungry Ogres and looks after him while searching for the child's parents.
